name: Enfeebled Mark
description: Your attacks and abilities deal <dynamic> 5.0% - 15%</dynamic> increased damage to enemies inside Resonating Arrow.

name: Empowered Release
description: Flayed Shot has an additional 5% chance to proc Flayer's Mark and it increases the damage of your next Kill Shot by <dynamic> 5.0% - 20%</dynamic>.

name: Spirit Attunement
description: Wild Spirits duration is increased by 3 sec and the damage dealt is increased by <dynamic> 10.0% - 25%</dynamic>.

name: Necrotic Barrage
description: Death Chakram generates an additional 2 Focus and the damage is increased by <dynamic>5.0% - 20%</dynamic>.

name: Markman's Advantage
description: Hunter's Mark decreases the damage the target deals to you by<dynamic> 3.0% - 10%</dynamic>.

name: Harmony of the Tortollan
description: Aspect of the Turtle cooldown reduced by<dynamic> 10.0 - 32</dynamic> sec.

name: Rejuvenating Wind
description: Exhilaration heals you for an additional<dynamic> 10.0% - 30%</dynamic> of your maximum health over 8 sec.
